snippet.title: Madden NFL 22 - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
EA reveals Madden NFL 22 in this new trailer featuring Tom Brady, Pat Mahomes, new presentation elements, and lots more.

#IGN #Madden #SummerOfGaming
